total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the positions of the number 8 in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the positions of the number 4 in the input grid.
Q3: Determine the relationship between the positions of the number 8 and the number 4.
Q4: Based on the relationship, create a new grid with the number 8.
Q5: Determine the size of the new grid based on the positions of the number 8 and the number 4.
Q6: Fill the new grid with the number 8 according to the pattern observed in the examples.
